short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Ads Scraper allows you to scrape LinkedIn ads details such as Advertiser name, Ad format, click URL, and target audience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Powerful LinkedIn Ad Library Extraction

Extract and analyze up to 50,000 LinkedIn ads with unprecedented depth and precision. Perfect for marketers, researchers, and competitive intelligence professionals.

🔍 Comprehensive Data Extraction

Capture a wealth of ad intelligence, including:
- Unique Ad Identifier
- Ad Format
- Advertiser Details (Name, URL, Logo)
- Paid By Information
- Campaign Timeline (Start & End Dates)
- Ad Creative Content
  - Body Text
  - Headlines
  - Descriptions
  - Call-to-Action Buttons
- Media Assets
  - Image URLs
  - Video Posters
  - Video URLs
  - Document URLs
- Performance Metrics
  - Impressions
  - Country-Level Impressions
- Targeting Insights
  - Language Targeting
  - Geographic Targeting
  - Audience Segments
  - Company Targeting

💡 Key Features
- One-click export to CSV/Excel/JSON
- Instant ad intelligence gathering

🛡️ Privacy & Compliance
- Reads publicly available ad library data
- Ad data stored locally (no cloud storage)

🛠️ TOOLS FAMILY
you can visit more useful LinkedIn tools by clicking the tools menu
- Sales Navigator Scraper
- LI Search Export
- Employee Export

Unlock the power of ad intelligence with LinkedIn Ads Scraper - Your competitive research just got smarter! 🏆

👋 FAQ
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@niomaker.com.

LinkedIn Ads Scraper is not endorsed by or affiliated with the LinkedIn Corporation, registered in the U.S. and other countries. LinkedIn is a trademark of the LinkedIn Corporation.
